column1: Little Goat Diner////+ Crab Dip - The dip wasn't bad flavor-wise (arguably the best thing we got here) but even though the dish was hot
column2: the dip inside was still cold. It was definitely full of crabmeat and was tasty
column3: but it would've been exponentially better if it had been warm. The crackers on the side were basically Ritz crackers - very uniform and buttery. The waitress kindly offered us a second batch of crackers when she noticed that we were low
column4: but the second batch was all super crumbly and fragile; they all broke immediately when we tried to dip them.
